医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
家庭食品环境影响青少年的饮食选择爱思唯尔发表在《营养教育与行为杂志》上的一项最新研究强调，与邻里食物选择相比，家庭食物环境对青少年饮食模式的显着影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Home-food-environment-shapes-adolescent-dietary-choices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Home-food-environment-shapes-adolescent-dietary-choices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b471e26e-e59a-4efc-ac7b-51722cf240e8 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 20:25:14 -0500 Home food environment shapes adolescent dietary choices
双修饰自然杀伤细胞对抗白血病的新方法存在多种形式的血癌——所有这些都被归为“白血病”一词。白血病的一种常见形式是急性髓性白血病（AML），其特征在于早期血细胞前体（即干细胞和由它们发育的前体细胞）的降解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/New-approach-in-fighting-leukemia-with-double-modified-natural-killer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/New-approach-in-fighting-leukemia-with-double-modified-natural-killer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98286c05-3528-4ee7-b3ed-f4bd262bad0e Wed, 18 Dec 2024 20:21:10 -0500 New approach in fighting leukemia with double-modified natural killer cells
研究发现肥胖管理药物的使用存在种族和民族差异新的研究表明，与白人相比，亚洲人、非西班牙裔黑人和西班牙裔人使用肥胖管理药物来降低体重的可能性明显低于白人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Study-finds-racial-and-ethnic-disparities-in-the-use-of-obesity-management-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Study-finds-racial-and-ethnic-disparities-in-the-use-of-obesity-management-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d6c2d92-2ba3-462e-b058-b920402b7098 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 20:15:55 -0500 Study finds racial and ethnic disparities in the use of obesity-management drugs
天然营养素烟酰胺和吡哆醇可逆转肌肉衰老研究人员发现烟酰胺（NAM）和吡哆醇（PN）是安全的、具有协同作用的营养素，可以恢复肌肉干细胞功能，逆转小鼠和人类与年龄相关的肌肉退化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Natural- Nutritions-nicotinamide-and-pyridoxine-reverse-muscle-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Natural- Nutritions-nicotinamide-and-pyridoxine-reverse-muscle-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1d0665a-18a2-4624-a76a-bd64c3a6f4ed Wed, 18 Dec 2024 17:39:00 -0500 Natural nutrients nicotinamide and pyridoxine reverse muscle aging
微藻发酵能否创造未来的超级食品？微藻发酵开启了可持续和营养食品生产的大门，提供具有抗糖尿病特性的生物活性肽，但在消费者接受度方面面临挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Could-microalgae-fermentation-create-the-superfoods-of-the-future.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Could-microalgae-fermentation-create-the-superfoods-of-the-future.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fcfa2e92-6e16-4cba-98a4-6e92453b245e Wed, 18 Dec 2024 17:18:00 -0500 Could microalgae fermentation create the superfoods of the future?
科学家在前往印度旅行后在澳大利亚儿童中检测到罕见的 H5N1 禽流感病毒一名从印度返回澳大利亚的 2.5 岁儿童感染了重组 H5N1 病毒，揭示了禽流感分支之间的基因混合以及南亚监测的空白。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Scientists-detect-rare-H5N1-avian-flu-strain-in-Australian-child-after-travel-to-India.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Scientists-detect-rare-H5N1-avian-flu-strain-in-Australian-child-after-travel-to-India.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcb62a53-2d10-4dd4-8eca-198007a76906 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 16:55:00 -0500 Scientists detect rare H5N1 avian flu strain in Australian child after travel to India
民主党参议员要求监管机构调查佐治亚州的医疗补助工作规则三名民主党参议员周二要求该国最高无党派政府监管机构调查佐治亚州一项计划的成本，该计划要求一些人工作以获得医疗补助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Democratic-senators-ask-watchdog-agency-to-investigate-Georgiae28099S-Medicaid-work-rule.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Democratic-senators-ask-watchdog-agency-to-investigate-Georgiae28099S-Medicaid-work-rule.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3cbc05c3-77ad-4e5b-b8cf-b8d449997177 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 14:30:20 -0500 Democratic senators ask watchdog agency to investigate Georgia’S Medicaid work rule
微小的塑料空气颗粒可能导致呼吸道疾病和其他疾病对 3,000 项研究的回顾还表明，这些微小的塑料空气颗粒可能会导致男性和女性不育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Minute- Plastic-air-articles-may-be-causing-respiratory-and-other-illnesses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Minute- Plastic-air-articles-may-be-causing-respiratory-and-other-illnesses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c68a3e3-fc07-4537-8dab-1c709b05a1d8 Wed, 18 Dec 2024 14:26:05 -0500 Minute plastic air particles may be causing respiratory and other illnesses
研究表明社会经济地位与癌症预期寿命之间存在联系尽管癌症治疗取得了重大进展，但不同社会经济群体所获得的益处并不相同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Research-shows-link- Between-socioeconomic-status-and-cancer-life-expectancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Research-shows-link- Between-socioeconomic-status-and-cancer-life-expectancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7c95cfd-3c4c-4884-b585-e3bbb28b3b9c Wed, 18 Dec 2024 14:17:55 -0500 Research shows link between socioeconomic status and cancer life expectancy
基因检测改善儿童神经发育障碍的护理加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心的一项新研究表明，在神经发育障碍（NDD）儿科患者的评估中加入基因检测可以带来更加个性化的护理，包括改变药物、转诊至临床试验或专家，以及监测潜在的医疗问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Genetic-testing-improves-care-for-pediatric-neurodevelopmental-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241218/Genetic-testing-improves-care-for-pediatric-neurodevelopmental-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68c91306-4839-4c9d-8470-d4fe21307e2d Wed, 18 Dec 2024 13:07:34 -0500 Genetic testing improves care for pediatric neurodevelopmental disorders
